A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have loved this franchise since I was a young boy and went into this film with only the expectations left by The for awakens. What I got was a huge disappointment on many levels. The new writer director gave the middle finger to everyone and pissed on fans. It tore apart all that was good about TFA. It ruined a story with such promise with rediculous ideas that didint work. Basically a hour of nonsense with stuff blowing up and convalutted story lines this film is A mess and Luke Skywalker deserved better as do the fans. It might be a visual spectacle but the story made no sense and if since most of the canon has been thrown away thanks to Disney\, I'll be throwing this POS out with it.
